intro: Pasania yenshanensis, commonly known as the Yenshan pasania, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and elliptical leaves. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions with high humidity and moderate temperatures. Its botanical significance lies in its unique morphology and limited distribution. Due to habitat loss, it is considered endangered and requires conservation efforts to ensure its survival.
